title: (Champion suggestion) Xex'zen Master of Rejuvenation
body:
Xex'zen would be a support with low offence but high healing properties. He could jg however he would spend most of the time healing and it would be hard to jg as he does no have many offensive abilities
HP515+88 5.4/5sec +0.48 
MP280 +60 3.98/5sec +0.52
AD 49+3.11 
Amour 19.1+1.6
MR 30+0
speed 340
Range 475
Passive: Self preservation Aura.
Allies within 1000units gain 10/15/20/25% healing from all sources.
Q: Beam of Restoration/ Beam of Destruction. 7.5sec 60/70/80/90/100mp 550Cast range
Beam of restoration: Heals an ally 50%ap +10/20/30/40/50 +5/6/7/8/9% missing hp.
Beam of destruction: Cast on enemies to deal 50%ap +20/40/60/80/100 magic damage as well as 5/6/7/8/9% of their current hp.
W: Restoration Zone. 0CD 400units area.
Health Healing: Costs 14/18/22/26/30mp/sec to heal nearby units 5%AP+ 10/15/20/25/30hp/sec
E: Healing wave. 70/80/90/100/110mp 475units cast range. 14/13.7/13.4/13.1/12.8sec
Sends a wave of energy through Xex'zen and his allies, bouncing through them and healing up to 4/4/5/5/6  units( prioritises champions and champions not hit). Heals 25%AP 40/80/120/160/200. Each bounce reduces the healing amount by 10/15/20/25.
R. Rejuvenation 15sec 150mp 500 range
Rejuvenates and ally in range. Healing 75%AP +200/350/500hp over 5seconds. However taking damage from champions will stop the effect.
At rank 2 now also heals 5/10/15% missing hp over 5sec
At rank 3 now instantly heals 50/75/100+15%AP hp.
Xex'zen would be played as a support champion, keeping his allies alive and harming the enemies when needed. 
Mana would be an important build as his abilities use up a high amount of mana so is mana regeneration.

replies.body: Interesting, would seem to be a champion that requires mechanics, but the role of a healing support has already been taken by {{champion:16}} .
Sona has a heal as does Kayle
but then again... we do need a champion with full healing capacity. Soraka has healing but her healing is no match for xex'zen.

Why do we need this though?
I think Riot haven't made a champ like this for the fact it might be a little overpowered
nah, not even close. He just heals people

Maybe consider the cooldown time of the abilities and the amount of heal required and most likely remove the Beam of Destruction on the Q so that he has less damage and therefore doesn't become too overpowered??? Also, i think the range of healing for his w should be slightly smaller and the time should be 5, 6, 7, 8 at all ranks, but just change the amount healed? E should be probably just 3 champions max and 3 other units e.g. minions. I think the ultimate should just be like tryndameres ult except on an ally and slightly heals. E.g. makes an ally invulnerable to all sources for 5/6/7 seconds and heals for 10/15/20 % missing HP... ???
well nami isnt full heal either.. she has quite the offense
